Complex analytics (joins, window functions, aggregations) use Analytics DB (DuckDB). Use for analyzing large datasets, monthly reports, time-series analysis, or complex SQL operations.
Table joins require Analytics DB (DuckDB) for relational queries. Use for combining data from multiple tables with complex relationships.
Window functions (running totals, moving averages) require Analytics DB (DuckDB). Use for time-series analysis, rankings, and sliding window calculations.
